name: accession
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal the time when someone starts a position of authority, especially a king or queen: 1926 was the year of Emperor Hirohito's accession to the throne. Compare
elevation (IMPORTANCE) formal
the time when a country officially joins a group of countries or signs an agreement: Poland's accession to the EU
